effect.shortEffect: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.
effect.full: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during strong sunlight.

description.black-white: May create another Berry after one is used.
description.black-2-white-2: May create another Berry after one is used.
description.x-y: May create another Berry after one is used.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: May create another Berry after one is used.
description.sun-moon: May create another Berry after one is used.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: May create another Berry after one is used.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: May create another Berry after one is used.
description.sword-shield: May create another Berry after one is used.
